message_thread.content:
1. Based on the extracted data from {'Course Information': {'Course Title': 'Create Engaging Social E-Commerce Campaigns on XiaoHongShu', 'Name of Organisation': 'Tertiary Infotech Pte Ltd', 'Classroom Hours': 7, 'Practical Hours': 7, 'Number of Assessment Hours': 4, 'Course Duration (Number of Hours)': 16, 'Industry': 'Tourism'}, 'Learning Outcomes': {'Learning Outcomes': ['LO1: Implement XiaoHongShu e-commerce campaigns in alignment to strategic marketing objectives.', 'LO2: Analyse XiaoHongShu campaign outcomes using sales performance data and consumer insights.', 'LO3: Analyse e-Commerce trends and customer review on XiaoHongShu’s Shop.'], 'Knowledge': ['K1: E-Commerce campaign execution tactics', 'K2: Messages to be communicated', 'K3: Methods to advertise products online', 'K4: Possible media options', 'K5: Campaign schedules', 'K6: Means of using data gathered from pre-campaign testing'], 'Ability': ['A1: Execute e-Commerce campaigns in alignment to e-Commerce strategies, sales and marketing strategies', 'A2: Monitor campaign performance and effectiveness in accordance with performance measures', 'A3: Analyse information on e-commerce sales and customer feedback', 'A4: Identify e-Commerce trends and patterns from campaign analysis', 'A5: Monitor social media platforms or online blog or vlog and forums related platforms for customer feedback or review'], 'Knowledge and Ability Mapping': {'KA1': ['K1', 'K2', 'A1'], 'KA2': ['K3', 'K4', 'A2', 'A3'], 'KA3': ['K5', 'K6', 'A4', 'A5']}}, 'TSC and Topics': {'TSC Title': ['E-Commerce Campaign Management'], 'TSC Code': ['TOU-SNM-3014-1.1-1'], 'Topics': ['Topic 1: Setup E-Commerce Campaign Management with XiaoHongShu (K1, K2, A1)', 'Topic 2: Monitor and Analyze E-Commerce Performance (K3, K4, A2, A3)', 'Topic 3: Analyze Social Trends and Customer Feedbacks  (K5, K6, A4, A5)'], 'Learning Units': ['LU1: Introduction to E-Commerce Campaign Management', 'LU2: Performance Monitoring and Analysis', 'LU3: Social Trends and Feedback Analysis']}, 'Assessment Methods': {'Assessment Methods': ['Written Assessment', 'Practical Performance'], 'Amount of Practice Hours': '7 hours', 'Course Outline': {'Learning Units': {'LU1': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 1: Setup E-Commerce Campaign Management with XiaoHongShu (K1, K2, A1)', 'Details': ['Key elements of e-commerce campaign with XiaoHongShu (K1)', 'Communicating effectively on XiaoHongShu (Little Red Book) (K2)', 'How to execute an effective e-commerce campaign on XiaoHongShu (Little Red Book) (A1)']}]}, 'LU2': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 2: Monitor and Analyze E-Commerce Performance (K3, K4, A2, A3)', 'Details': ['List and advertise products online on XiaoHongShu (K3)', 'Advertising media options available on XiaoHongShu (K4)', 'Monitor e-commerce performance (A2)', 'Analyze online sales performance (A3)']}]}, 'LU3': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 3: Analyze Social Trends and Customer Feedbacks (K5, K6, A4, A5)', 'Details': ['Decide your social e-Commerce campaign schedules (K5)', 'Analyze e-commerce trends and patterns from campaign analysis on XiaoHongShu (K6, A4)', 'Monitor customer feedback and review (A5)']}]}}}, 'Instructional Methods': ['Didactic Questioning', 'Demonstration']}}, generate your justifications.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.

{
    "Performance Gaps": [
        "Learners are unclear with implementing e-commerce campaigns on XiaoHongShu that align with strategic marketing objectives.",
        "Learners struggle to analyze campaign outcomes using sales performance data and consumer insights effectively.",
        "Learners lack the ability to analyze e-commerce trends and customer reviews on XiaoHongShu’s Shop."
    ],
    "Attributes Gained": [
        "Ability to implement e-commerce campaigns on XiaoHongShu in alignment with strategic marketing objectives.",
        "Proficiency in analyzing campaign outcomes using sales performance data and consumer insights.",
        "Skill in analyzing e-commerce trends and customer reviews on XiaoHongShu’s Shop."
    ],
    "Post-Training Benefits to Learners": [
        "Enhanced capability to design and execute e-commerce campaigns that align with broader marketing strategies, leading to more cohesive and effective marketing efforts.",
        "Improved ability to derive actionable insights from campaign data, enabling more informed decision-making and optimization of marketing strategies.",
        "Increased understanding of market trends and customer feedback, allowing for better alignment of products and services with consumer needs and preferences."
    ]
}
